attributes.action: consider re-introducing the death penalty for child killers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most of the U.K population will have been horrified by what we have read and heard about the case of little Baby P.

I emplore the Prime Minister to consider re-introducing the death penalty for the monsters who tortured and killed little Baby P.

If we had such deterrent, maybe our childern would be that much safer.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence:  http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
